name: Suzanne Olsen
text: We came in late to order pizza and have salads.  The service was great!  The guys were friendly and helpful.  The pizzas were good, though pricey, hence only four stars.  It really shouldn't cost $50 for two pizzas, three salads, and two drinks.

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Not a big fan of Pizza Hut personally, but this is a good store. Its always clean and the food is good quality.

name: Renee Martin
text: Ordered a large 3 toppings pizza, wings, garlic knots got home to find medium pizza, tiny wings, and garlic bread knots, I thought the knots came with cheese inside them..  This was the first time I didn't get what I thought I paid for! …More

name: Cindy Stephens
text: 42 dollars for two pizzas with 2 toppings each and one twi letter  the food wasnt that good it was doughy and under cooked. Would have took it back but the kids was hungry and would eat it. But we should have wen to eat steak for that price.

name: Chris Gladden
text: Everything looked delicious but Salad bar needed touching up & few veggies replaced,dressings refilled. The sauce for cheese sticks was thicken than other pizza hut places we visited- that is definitely a bonus

name: Mike Wooley
text: If I could rate this place lower, I would. Out of every place I have ever had a meal in, this is the worst. The food was cold. The service was bad. The tables were dirty. There was food in the floor and all the employees were doing was …More

name: Steve Williams
text:
RE: Pizza Hut in Oneonta, AL
I stopped in for the lunch buffet with my 2 children. The only employees that saw was 1 waitress and 1 cook. If there were others they stayed out of site. Every …More

text: Service was good. But our order of bread sticks ended up being 1/2 bread sticks ans 1/2 cinnamon sticks which didn't taste good dipped in the sauce. They did fix the mistake with a fresh new order.

name: Helen Willis
text: Ordered a calzone and wings for delivery. Calzone was cold and cheese wasn't melted. Girl that took order was very rude.

name: Shirley Jones
text: My Mom and I went to have lunch buffet together.  They were open later than usual for lunch and I asked if they were expanding their buffet times. I was told they will be  closing their dinning rooms all together and going strictly to carryout soon. We will miss them

Great food at a reasonable price
Lunch is a buffet for $5.99.
Good service too.

name: Christina Mullins
text: Service was great, pizza bar was empty fast gotta get to it before the kids. LOL. They refilled with anything you asked for!

name: Michael Ford
text: Food was good. Waiter was non attentive. Never filled my glass back up. Had to hunt him down to get my check so that I could leave. The place was not crowded. Decent atmosphere. I give the visit a 3 out of 5.

name: Hal Scoggins
text: The crust on our pizza was too doughy and limp. The restroom was unkept, 2 dirty plungers was laying by the nasty toilet, trash was over flowing. Always check the rest rooms first.

name: David w Doran
text: Horrible service. Needs to clean up more. DIRTY. Absolutely filthy (tables, floors, cups, EVERYTHING). Had to walk around for about 5 minutes just to find a clean table that was sticky. Workers were on their phones instead of paying …More

text: Had to wait way too long for more pizza on the buffet line.  There was 2 pans of pizza with pineapple on it.  No one in my party (4) liked pineapple, and pepperoni pizza was out.  Pepperoni or others like that should be the majority selections on the buffet.
